channel.title: Timers
channel.description: im trying to add my own clan wars area and i would like to know how to make it so if they die they cant go back for like another 10 minutes and i wanna know how to make it a timed fight area so when the timer is done they get teled home

item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

how about realtime?

instantiate 3 new objects, get the system milliseconds, convert into seconds (or minutes, seconds is often better) and use that as timer.

to use it you would be required to use

identifier.StopMethod();

and a little bit of string manipulation will help you with this if you base all your timed actions on this… well I find it easier

and an if statement checking for player died <10 minutes a go if true then they get a message, else they are allowed to come back.

pretty basic if statements should do :). Pm me and i’ll send u part of the code that I created/used in my apps.
g2g eat now.

etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Make an if statement that checks if the player is in the clan wars area. And make a boolean for it and make it true in the if statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

if (youdied == true && YOURBOOLEANFORINCLANWARSAREAHERE == true) { Thread.sleep(600000); youdied == false; }
